item.name: getList
item.sql: SELECT t.*, t1.name StatusName, t2.name NeedTel, t3.name NeedFlow, t4.name NeedNotit FROM (SELECT RID FROM (SELECT R.RID, ROWNUM LINENUM FROM (SELECT t.rowid RID FROM DOWN_CHANNEL t WHERE {@t.DownChannelNo} {&@t.Status} {&:ChannelName} order by t.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO desc) R WHERE ROWNUM <= { :PS} * { :PI}) WHERE LINENUM > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) TAB1 inner join DOWN_CHANNEL t on t.rowid = TAB1.RID left join sys_dictionary t1 on t1.value = t.Status and t1.type = 'Status' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.Need_Recharge_Tel and t2.type = 'IsNeed' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t3.value = t.Need_Rechagre_Flow and t3.type = 'IsNeed' left join sys_dictionary t4 on t4.value = t.Need_Notity and t4.type = 'IsNeed' order by t.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO desc
